benefitsPage.benefitCopyDuration: In 2011, users of the DMA LLC spent over 1,200 hours interacting with valuable educational content. That‘s 1,200 hours they could have spent looking at YOUR campaign.
benefitsPage.benefitCopyTablet: The DMA LLC is also optimized for use with tablet devices— your message will stay in front of buyers everywhere they go!
benefitsPage.benefitCopyAffordable: Interact with 12,000 qualified buyers for hours at time. The DMA LLC gives you unprecedented access at an unbeatable price — now you can communicate directly with these valuable customers.
benefitsPage.benefitCopyMetrics: The DMA LLC incorporates an extensive reporting system that is available anytime — this gives you the ability to quantify and track your ROI instantly!
benefitsPage.benefitCopyLibrary: Comprised of over 125 hours of professionally recorded sessions from DMA’s annual conferences, the DMA LLC is a complete educational content resource for all direct marketers.
benefitsPage.benefitCopyAccess: DMA promotes the LLC through both print and digital campaigns. Your message will be showcased in front of dedicated professionals involved in direct marketing — enabling your organization to reach qualified buyers.
benefitsPage.benefitCopyCredibility: Since 1917, the Direct Marketing Association has been the definitive resource for relevant information and educational opportunities in the industry. By advertising in the DMA LLC, your campaign will appear within the trusted network of DMA.
benefitsPage.benefitCopyCreative: Our agency-quality creative team offers full design services at no additional cost. We will work with you to ensure that your campaign is engaging and drives the traffic you need.
